channel.title: Masa Sumimoto Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Masa Sumimoto Blog

item.title: I tried using AFFINITY Designer
item.author: masa.sumimoto@gmail.com (Masaaki Sumimoto)
item.description: I am currently studying a design software called AFFINITY Designer. It has the concept of PERSONA. I feel like I’m using Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator. One of my favorite tool is Isometric tool. By using this, it will be very easy to create a design using 3D or perspective. While learning it in the tutorial, I made some designs using the word TREK. I could easily create these typography.

item.title: Hey guys!
item.author: masa.sumimoto@gmail.com (Masaaki Sumimoto)
item.description: Hello, I amã€€Masaaki Sumimoto. Japanese. Please call me Masa or Masa Sumimoto (^^). I am based in Kobe, Japan. I love Programming, Design, Music and some Arts. I started test blog for learning SSG(Static Site Generator) is here. I may suddenly stop blogging or make a significant change. Therefore, I will also introduce My portal site . This domain will be permanent and I will operate. (^^)/

item.title: About me
item.author: masa.sumimoto@gmail.com (Masaaki Sumimoto)
item.description: Hi! I am a Frontend Developer, Based in Kobe, Japan. Both as a hobby and for work, I make websites, web services, Design and Music. My favorite time is to ride slowly on a sports bike in the city of Kobe. Skills Designing I use Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe XD, Affinity Designer frequently. Programming I use HTML5, CSS(SCSS), JavaScript frequently. I have experience using PHP, Go, Ruby(Ruby on Rails), WordPress, MovableType, HUGO, React.
